entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
